overview.en: BCR is a globally distributed LAAS ecosystem service platform, which combines the latest block chain technology with decentralization, incentive and consensus mechanisms to reshape the communication between users and websites.
overview.zh: BCR 是一个全球分布式 LAAS 生态服务平台，结合了最新的区块链技术，以去中心化为手段，辅以奖励机制和共识机制，重塑用户和网站之间的交流方式
